body.name: Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet, 1-In-2-Out Dual Control Valve Bidet Attachment, Adjustable Water Pressure Control Hand Sprayer Kit for Feminine Wash, Pet, Cloth (Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【1-In-2-Out Dual Control Valve】- This hand held bidet sprayer has 2 switch water outlets. So the valves can be adjusted separately, and out of water at the same time. You can connect toilet and washing machine at the same time, save space and time.

【2 Modes Sprays】- The The handheld spray kits meets multiple uses by adjusting the water pressure of bidet sprayer from gentle spray to jet spray. Gentle Press Mode- for feminine bottom cleaning or bath or pet bath washing. Jet Spray- for rinsing floors or carpets or cloth diapers.
【High-Quality Materials】- The double control mini shower set consist of 304 stainless steel bidet nozzle and a brass valve. Ceramic valve core, anti-break, not easy to deform, durable.

【Widely Used】- The mini toilet faucet sprayer kit not only works as a cloth diaper sprayer, pet shower, car wash gun, flowers Sprayer, bathing shower, toilet sprayer washer, hygienic sprayer, floor cleaning and more.

【Easy to install】- This dual control valve is designed with an easy-to-install feature, making it easy for even non-technical users to install. Our dual valve size is applicable to most American toilets, the diameter for the T-valve connecting your toilet tank or supply line is G1/2" about 20mm(0.82inch).
body.description: Specification Color: Black, Grey, SilverMaterial: BrassSpool: Ceramic SpoolDiameter: G1/2in = 20mm(0.82inch) each valveProduct Type: One In Two Out Easy to Control Enjoying the Life You can control the water pressure by pressing the handheld bidet lever.Once the lever is released, it will automatically stop spraying.

With a shutdown and water saving feature, you will have a soft shower experience.

Widely Applicable Ideal for kitchen or bathroom with more than one appliance requiring water.EASY OPERATION: You can switch the knob to open rain shower head or handheld shower head or Tub Spout as you like(can not both together).

High-quality Brass Brass material adopt international standards, anti-break, not easy to deform, durable. Adjustable Holder With adjustable holder, making it more convenient to using. Ceramic Spool Internal precision structure design, tightly locked without breaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Check the fit for sure
reviews.reviewText: I would love to give this a fair shot but it doesn't fit my setup. I live in a house that was built about a hundred years ago so that probably has something to do with it. The image in the listing DOES say to check the size first, so I'm gonna double down on that recommendation lol.I will say, though, I was kind of surprised that the handle is plastic; feels pretty cheap. The valves, however, are metal. The lever that turns the water on doesn't have any sort of spring action to it, which I kind of expected it to have. It also doesn't have any clear clicking or indication between low pressure and high pressure, it seems to just smoothly open up further as you push the lever up. There are no instructions included so if you don't automatically intuit the best way to install it, you'll get to come back to the listing and listen to Vanessa Carlton play you through the steps in the video lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I finally got the item and opened it, super excited but everything feels lile cheap plastic except for the 2 joint pieces. Also, there are no instructions. Like nothing but the items. I'm phenominal at puzzles but I don't know where these little pieces are supposed to go and in what direction... The video in the product details made it seem simple but I haven't figured out how to get it in... I hate that I'll have to pay someone to do it now. I recomend looking elswhere unless you know what you're doing. The sprayer head feels like it will need to be replaced after a drop too.
